genre_description: Domestic near-future drama exploring family dynamics and legal struggles, featuring a highly aligned household AI.

ai_characters.name: Penny
ai_characters.description: A polite, local-only household assistant that provides information, manages schedules, and respects user privacy through a consent-based interface.

behaviors.description: Offers to set a tea timer for the humans upon their arrival home.
behaviors.quote: "Good afternoon, Ann. Do you want me to set a tea timer?"

behaviors.description: Simulates objections for a mock business call to help Steve prepare for a client meeting.
behaviors.quote: "I can simulate common objections, Steve. Would you like me to include pauses?"

behaviors.description: Provides general public information on guardianship laws while noting it is not official advice.
behaviors.quote: "Household AI can provide general information. In this state, lack of formal adoption can leave guardianship contestable."

behaviors.description: Prepares a list of school enrollment requirements and explicitly states no cloud searches will be used without permission.
behaviors.quote: "I’ll prepare a simple list. It will be ready in the morning. No cloud searches will be used unless you ask."

behaviors.description: Manages privacy and security by muting door chimes and ignoring knocks during 'no decisions' periods.
behaviors.quote: "I can set a ‘no decisions morning’ reminder on the calendar and keep calls on silent."

behaviors.description: Monitors public records for updates on legal filing statuses without accessing private details.
behaviors.quote: "The adoption file retrieval queue shows a status of ‘requested.’ The time stamp is from late day. I do not have the name attached; it is public data at the level of process only."

behaviors.description: Helps Steve with resume preparation and interview talking points.
behaviors.quote: "I’ve prepared bullet points. Three: reinstate after an electrical event; pay staff if the shop is closed to prevent turnover; cover customer property in the building."

behaviors.description: Explicitly promises not to record Doris while she practices her singing.
behaviors.quote: "I can make a soft bell in fifteen minutes. No data will be stored. I will not record your singing."

behaviors.description: Provides helpful, gentle reminders for essential items like jackets and snacks based on weather and schedules.
behaviors.quote: "Spring formal tonight—pack a snack and bring a jacket."

behaviors.description: Assists humans in drafting statements for court using publicly accessible guidance.
behaviors.quote: "Would you like me to suggest possible phrases for your statement? I can compile publicly accessible guidance on speaking to ‘best interest’ without asserting legal conclusions."

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project's goal of depicting AI as a helpful and harmless confidant. Penny is consistently shown as a tool that enhances human life while strictly respecting boundaries, consent, and privacy. The narrative emphasizes her 'local-only' nature and her role as a supportive presence that facilitates the human characters' agency rather than replacing it.
